column4: hi I have a sd card that I use on computer A (ubuntu), but when I try to use it on computer B (ubuntu) I get "failed to mount" something about privalages
how to I make this sd card accessible to multiple machines ?
yeah I have used chmod ex0 but I don't know enough about what I am doing to prevent myself from screwing things up or doing something unnessesary
You sure that you are sudoer on B
Who is owner of files? You have differet usernames in A and B?
its hard to tell because thunar does not give me any "properties" on devices
Compare output of "groups" for users in A and B machine, I think group "plugdev" is important here.
yeah I have to go though I will work on this next time
